product_overview: Indian Bazaar Guy is a modern e-commerce web application tailored for the Indian market, providing a seamless and enjoyable online shopping experience with a diverse range of quality products across multiple categories.
core_goals: Offer a wide variety of products relevant to Indian consumer preferences.
Deliver a smooth and intuitive online shopping experience across devices.
Implement secure and reliable user authentication and session management.
Enable efficient product browsing, searching, and filtering.
Facilitate an easy-to-use shopping cart and checkout process with secure payment integration.
Provide users with a comprehensive dashboard to manage profile and order history.
Ensure high performance with fast loading times and scalability to support concurrent users.
Maintain stringent security standards for data protection and user privacy.
key_features: Dynamic banner carousel on homepage showcasing featured products and promotions.
Hierarchical product browsing with three-level categories and real-time search with suggestions.
User authentication system supporting login, registration, password recovery, and session management.
Interactive shopping cart allowing add, update, remove items with a persistent state.
User dashboard featuring profile management, order history, and account settings.
Secure and streamlined checkout process with order summary, shipping info, payment, and confirmation.
Responsive design optimized for mobile, tablet, and desktop with Indian-inspired UI.
Reusable components including carousels, product cards, rating systems, and action buttons.
Next.js API routes supporting dynamic data such as banner and category mappings.
user_flow_summary: User visits the homepage and views dynamic banners and product categories.
User browses products by selecting categories or using the search bar with live suggestions.
User views product details including images, ratings, and reviews.
User adds desired products to the shopping cart from product listings or detail pages.
User reviews and manages cart contents via the cart page with options to update quantities or remove items.
User proceeds to checkout, fills shipping information, selects payment method, and places the order.
User receives order confirmation on a dedicated thank-you page with order details.
User can sign up, log in, or recover passwords through the authentication pages.
User accesses the dashboard to view and update profile information and track past orders.
validation_criteria: Homepage loads within 3 seconds and subsequent navigations under 1 second.
All interactive elements such as carousels, product cards, and buttons function correctly.
User authentication supports secure login, signup, password recovery, and session expiration.
Shopping cart accurately updates item quantities and persists data across sessions.
Checkout process validates shipping info and processes payments securely.
Application is responsive and renders correctly on mobile, tablet, and desktop devices.
APIs return expected data structures and handle errors gracefully.
Security measures including JWT authentication, HTTPS, and input validation are in place and verified.
Performance metrics such as uptime at 99.9% and error rates under 0.1% are achieved.
